attributes.action: Stop blaming all Muslims for terrorism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our class (10RS4) are currently studying justice as part of the GCSE RE course at Kingsbury High School in London. In class we voted on issues we would like to petition the Prime Minister about. We believe it is wrong that all Muslims are being blamed for terrorism and it should stop. Please sign our petition.
